channel.title: Custom problem XD
channel.description:
Hello,
My brother made a Custom Shield but when we add it into are server. My bro trys it on his account and does his pickup #####. It doesnt show in inv or it frezze the account.
Any reason why its not working? here the code thing.
[code]if(i == 13489) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14255; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14355;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14355;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "RSC Shield";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "made by storm".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]
Anyone can See the problem? PM back ;)

item.title: Custom problem XD
item.dc:creator: @lordante lordante
item.description:
@lordante wrote:

Hello,

My brother made a Custom Shield but when we add it into are server.
My bro trys it on his account and does his pickup #####.
It doesnt show in inv or it frezze the account.

Any reason why its not working?
here the code thing.

if(i == 13489) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14255; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 1000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 470; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt165 = 14355;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14355;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "RSC Shield";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "made by storm".getBytes();//examin info }

Anyone can See the problem?
PM back

Read full topic
